name: clono
description: An extension tool for Vivliostyle Flavored Markdown that adds powerful features for technical book writing, including cross-references to headings, figures, tables and code blocks, footnotes, and automatic index generation for CSS typesetting with Vivliostyle.

scripts.test: npx shadow-cljs compile test && node out/test.js
